<small>Hebrew form: [[H2145]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְּכַר‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==ram== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּכְרָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, also (and primarily) ***male***, see Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָכָר‎</span>); — plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּכְּ רִין‎</span> for sacrifice [[Ezra.6.9|Ezra 6:9]]; [[Ezra.6.17|Ezra 6:17]]; [[Ezra.7.17|Ezra 7:17]].
